title: Repro Westy Cots - Now with Cot Boot pics and prices

posts.content:
Looks like rusty has been on the old wacky again!!!!
Neil, is that your mother inlaws table cloth?
That table cloth could do with a wash its as old as is bus !!!

Stevelambretta wrote:That table cloth could do with a wash its as old as is bus !!!

Thats done it now, SONIA
Thanks Neil, Spot On

Bump

Will have a couple of cots available at Stanford Hall

More boots being made at the moment

Cheers

Neil
Neil, did the peeps from the states follow up ?

No, been all quiet

Must register on the samba and do a proper ad

Cheers

Strange that cause they both pmed me asking for you paypal addy

Hi All,

Any fitted pics?

Been through the thread and nice bit of kit, but no pics of one fitted.

I have a devon copy in my van with front safari's. I know that it is not correct for the interior, but would it fit as I need a sleeping solution for my 2 year old son?

Many thanks,

flip

Fitted one to a bus with safari's on Sunday, but didn't take any pics D'oh.... They definitely fit, but are a bit more fiddly than a bus without safari's

Mate has Safari's and a cot, I'll ask him to post some pics. I'm away this weekend but I'll take some in my bus next week when the front beam is back on if not

Cheers

Neil

I would really appreciate pics if anyone can take a photo or two, just so I can show the missus.

Also, any stories or experiences of people camping with their kids in a hammock would also be great.

Many thanks,

Flip
